refnamediv.refpurpose: Escapes a string for use in a mysql_query

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function will escape the unescaped_string, so that it is safe to place it in a mysql_query.

note.simpara: This function is identical to mysql_real_escape_string except that mysql_real_escape_string takes a connection handler and escapes the string according to the current character set. mysql_escape_string does not take a connection argument and does not respect the current charset setting.
